modName: Imperial Hunter Green Retexture HD and Solitude Guard to Mat
summary: Imperial and Solitude Guards Armor Hunter Green Retexture HD
descriptionHtml:
Version 1.1 Fixed my mispack error should be good now.

Imperial Hunter green armor with solitude armor retexture. Male and female versions. My characters male imperial so if any you want to upload any pic\'s of female or other races thank you.

Versions are upscale to 1024x1024 (Boots and Gloves) and 2048x2048 (chests and some Helms).

Hunter Green Retexture.


Shields are not in pack, I use this mod- http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2982
Also, Helm in one Pic is this mod- http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3877 
(I recolor for my use but did not include).


Install:

1.Unzip
2.copy folder to skyrim folder (where you tesv.exe is)

Nexus manager will work due the way this is packed.

Hope you all enjoy.

Author
Draco1122

Keep in mind pictures are in good lighting will be darker in game in most areas.


[color=yellow][u][b]My other mods[/b][/u][/color]
[color=yellow][u][b]Draco1122[/b][/u][/color]
